info: T means true, F means False. If no publications, just leave the publication structure unchanged.
name: Janice Redmond

publications.text: Redmond, J., Walker, B., (2016), The value of energy audits for SMEs: An Australian example. Energy Efficiency, 9(5), 1053-1063, DOI: 10.1007/s12053-015-9409-4.
